name: A.V.A. Alliance of Valiant Arms™: Rifleman Pack
detailed_description:
Weapons hot! This pack contains a permanent assault rifle for the rifleman class, a sidearm, a melee weapon, an armor package, a temporary character and grenade skin, and a Double Booster that doubles the amount of in-game currency and experience you earn for 15 calendar days.

  • AK-47 Lion (Permanent)–Inspired by the East German Mpi-K, the AK-47 Lion improves upon the original while still retaining all of its best features.

  • Colt SAA (Permanent)–Get the gun that won the West! This reproduction single-action pistol can rapidly fire high-powered rounds, but its antique design can make it difficult to handle.

  • Watermelon Bar (Permanent)–What's for dinner? A piping-hot beatdown! Melee weapon.

  • 16 Armor Package–A full set of armor, combat-ready for all classes! These items grant must-have game effects, including decreased damage, decreased recoil, increased movement speed, and more! The armor contained in this package consumes EUROs (in-game currency) during use.

  • Ginny (30 Days)–[Regina Gadea Acosta] A member of the intelligence community, known for her expertise in sea infilitration and special operations. (Lucky Shot +2%. When using this item, other items that affect character appearance will not be applied.) This character skin expires after 30 calendar days.

  • Ginny Doll Bomb (15 Days)–Show some love! Upon explosion, the Ginny Doll Bomb tags the ground with a Heart and a box of chocolates. The weapon contained in this package expires after 15 calendar days.

  • Double Booster (15 Days)–Activate the Double Booster to receive double the amount of EURO (in-game currency) and EXP earned from matches. The Double Booster expires after 15 calendar days.

short_description: Weapons hot! This pack contains a permanent assault rifle for the rifleman class, a sidearm, a melee weapon, an armor package, a temporary character and grenade skin, and a Double Booster that doubles the amount of in-game currency and experience you earn for 15 calendar days.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 30 GB
  • Video Card: Nvidia GeForce 7300 / AMD Radeon X1600 Pro / Intel HD 3000 (256 MB)
  • DirectX®: 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
• OS: Windows 7, 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 / AMD Phenom 9500
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 30 GB
  • Video Card: Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT / AMD Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX®: 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
